text.section:
A registered pharmacy technician shall notify the Board of each plea of guilty for, conviction of, or entry of a plea of nolo contendere for a felony or a crime involving moral turpitude, regardless of whether:
An adjudication of guilt or sentencing or imposition of sentence is withheld; or
Any appeal or other proceeding is pending regarding the matter.
The registered pharmacy technician shall notify the Board within 7 days of the conviction or entry of the plea.
